benchmark_details.name: IQBench
benchmark_details.overview: IQBench is a novel benchmark specifically designed to evaluate the fluid intelligence of Vision-Language Models (VLMs) using curated visual IQ test questions. It emphasizes both the accuracy of predictions and the interpretability of the reasoning process.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To advance research on the fluid intelligence of VLMs by evaluating their reasoning capabilities on visual IQ tests.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset contains 500 samples, which may limit diversity in evaluation.

data.source: Manually curated from various sources, including educational materials and online repositories.
data.format: PNG images with associated questions and reasoning patterns
data.annotation: Manually annotated with reasoning patterns and correct answers.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated as an exact match of the modelâ€™s prediction to the correct answer. Reasoning score is derived by comparing model explanations with annotated reasoning patterns.
methodology.interpretation: Scores reflect both the correctness of the final answer and the coherence of the reasoning process.
methodology.baseline_results: o4-mini achieved the highest accuracy of 0.615 on IQBench tasks.
methodology.validation: Evaluation involved both automated metrics and human assessments for reasoning quality.
